mapper.select: SELECT egs.*, e.exam_name, g.grade_name, s.name AS sub_name FROM examgradesub egs LEFT JOIN exam e ON egs.examid=e.id LEFT JOIN grade g ON egs.grade_id=g.id LEFT JOIN subject s ON egs.sub_id = s.id WHERE egs.examid = #{examId}

SELECT egs.*, e.exam_name, g.grade_name, s.name AS sub_name FROM examgradesub egs LEFT JOIN exam e ON egs.examid=e.id LEFT JOIN grade g ON egs.grade_id=g.id LEFT JOIN subject s ON egs.sub_id = s.id WHERE egs.id = #{id}
SELECT mark_switch FROM examgradesub WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE examgradesub SET blank_answer_paper=#{fileName} where id=#{id}
UPDATE examgradesub SET blank_questions_paper=#{fileName} where id=#{id}
UPDATE examgradesub SET temp_upload=1, blank_answer_paper=#{answerPaper}, original_data=#{originalData}, xml_server_path=#{xmlServerPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select ee.id as eid, group_concat(ans.isfinal, '-', ans.score) as score, question.branch, question.mark_mode as markmode from answer as ans join paper on paper.id = ans.paperid join examinee as ee on ee.exam_code = paper.exam_code join question on question.id = ans.quesid where paper.exam_grade_sub_id = #{egsId} and ans.isviewed = 1 group by ans.quesid, ans.paperid, ee.id order by eid

select ifnull(sum(oa.score), 0) as score, examinee.id as eid, question.branch from obj_answer as oa join paper on paper.id = oa.paperid join examinee on examinee.exam_code = paper.exam_code join question on (question.exam_grade_sub_id = paper.exam_grade_sub_id and oa.quesno >= question.startno and question.endno >= oa.quesno) where paper.exam_grade_sub_id = #{egsId} group by eid, question.branch order by eid
SELECT id,mark_mode AS markMode from question where exam_grade_sub_id=#{egsId}
SELECT COUNT(1) from examgradesub where examid=#{examId} AND status <> '2';

SELECT qp.quesid, qp.paperid, qarea_id, pageno, paper_img, mark_img, posx, posy FROM (SELECT quesid, paperid FROM answer WHERE quesid in (SELECT id FROM question WHERE exam_grade_sub_id = ${egsId}) GROUP BY quesid, paperid HAVING COUNT(*) = 2) qp JOIN paper p ON qp.paperid = p.id JOIN answer ans ON qp.quesid = ans.quesid AND qp.paperid = ans.paperid JOIN answer_img ansi ON ans.id = ansi.ans_id JOIN quesarea qa ON ansi.qarea_id = qa.id WHERE p.exam_grade_sub_id=#{egsId} ORDER BY paperid, pageno, posx, posy
mapper.insert: insert into ustudy.dmark_img (quesid, paperid, qarea_id, mark_img) values (#{quesId}, #{paperId}, #{qareaId}, #{markImg}) on duplicate key update mark_img=VALUES(mark_img)
mapper.select: SELECT ans.quesid, ans.paperid, qarea_id, pageno, paper_img, mark_img, posx, posy FROM (SELECT quesid, paperid FROM answer WHERE quesid in (SELECT id FROM question WHERE exam_grade_sub_id = ${egsId}) GROUP BY quesid, paperid HAVING COUNT(*) = 1 ) qp JOIN paper p ON qp.paperid = p.id JOIN answer ans ON qp.quesid = ans.quesid AND qp.paperid = ans.paperid JOIN answer_img ansi ON ans.id = ansi.ans_id JOIN quesarea qa ON ansi.qarea_id = qa.id WHERE p.exam_grade_sub_id=#{egsId} UNION SELECT ans.quesid, ans.paperid, qarea_id, pageno, paper_img, mark_img, posx, posy FROM answer ans JOIN paper p ON ans.paperid = p.id JOIN answer_img ansi ON ans.id = ansi.ans_id JOIN quesarea qa ON ansi.qarea_id = qa.id WHERE ans.isfinal = 1 AND p.exam_grade_sub_id=#{egsId} UNION SELECT di.quesid, di.paperid, qarea_id, pageno, paper_img, mark_img, posx, posy FROM dmark_img di JOIN paper p ON di.paperid = p.id JOIN quesarea qa ON di.qarea_id = qa.id WHERE p.exam_grade_sub_id=#{egsId} ORDER BY paperid, pageno, posx, posy

select oa.quesno, oa.score, oa.answer, q.type, qa.pageno, qa.posx, qa.posy, qa.width, qa.height from obj_answer as oa join paper as p on oa.paperid = p.id join question as q on q.exam_grade_sub_id = p.exam_grade_sub_id and oa.quesno >= q.startno and q.endno >= oa.quesno left join quesarea qa on q.id = qa.quesid where p.id = #{paperId} order by quesno

SELECT ans.quesid, ans.score, t.teacname, q.scorediff, ans.isfinal, qa.pageno, qa.posx, qa.posy, qa.width, qa.height from (SELECT quesid, paperid FROM answer GROUP BY quesid, paperid HAVING COUNT(*) = 2 UNION SELECT quesid, paperid FROM answer where isfinal = 1) qp join answer ans on ans.quesid = qp.quesid and ans.paperid = qp.paperid join question q on q.id = ans.quesid join quesarea qa on qa.quesid = ans.quesid join teacher t on t.teacid = ans.teacid where ans.paperid = #{paperId} order by ans.quesid, ans.isfinal

select id, ans_mark_img, score from ( select (@cnt:=@cnt+1) as cnt, id, ans_mark_img, score from ( select ans.id, ai.ans_mark_img, ans.score from ustudy.paper p join ustudy.examgradesub egs on egs.id = p.exam_grade_sub_id join ustudy.question q on q.exam_grade_sub_id = egs.id join ustudy.answer ans on ans.quesid = q.id and ans.paperid = p.id join ustudy.answer_img ai on ai.ans_id = ans.id where egs.id = #{egsId} and egs.sub_id = 1 and q.type = "解答题" and q.score > 20 and ai.ans_mark_img = (select min(ans_mark_img) from ustudy.answer_img ai2 where ai2.ans_id = ai.ans_id) and ans.score > 0 order by ans.score desc ) tb1, (select @cnt:=0) cnt ) tb2 where ((select count(*) from ustudy.paper p join ustudy.examgradesub egs on egs.id = p.exam_grade_sub_id join ustudy.question q on q.exam_grade_sub_id = egs.id join ustudy.answer ans on ans.quesid = q.id and ans.paperid = p.id where egs.id = #{egsId} and egs.sub_id = 1 and q.type = '解答题' and q.score > 20 and ans.score > 0)/50) > cnt

select id, ans_mark_img, score from ( select (@cnt:=@cnt+1) as cnt, id, ans_mark_img, score from ( select ans.id, ai.ans_mark_img, ans.score from ustudy.paper p join ustudy.examgradesub egs on egs.id = p.exam_grade_sub_id join ustudy.question q on q.exam_grade_sub_id = egs.id join ustudy.answer ans on ans.quesid = q.id and ans.paperid = p.id join ustudy.answer_img ai on ai.ans_id = ans.id where egs.id = #{egsId} and egs.sub_id = 1 and q.type = "解答题" and q.score > 20 and ai.ans_mark_img = (select min(ans_mark_img) from ustudy.answer_img ai2 where ai2.ans_id = ai.ans_id) and ans.score > 0 order by ans.score asc ) tb1, (select @cnt:=0) cnt ) tb2 where ((select count(*) from ustudy.paper p join ustudy.examgradesub egs on egs.id = p.exam_grade_sub_id join ustudy.question q on q.exam_grade_sub_id = egs.id join ustudy.answer ans on ans.quesid = q.id and ans.paperid = p.id where egs.id = #{egsId} and egs.sub_id = 1 and q.type = '解答题' and q.score > 20 and ans.score > 0)/100) > cnt
mapper.update: UPDATE ustudy.answer SET mflag=#{mflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id=#{ansId};
